item.title: Wireless External Storage With Native Plex Server
item.description: When Apple launched the Vision Pro, it promised a revolution in spatial computing. But for those of us who love to consume and create media, the limited internal storage quickly became a glaring issue. Enter the WD My Passport Wireless Pro, an unassuming device that has transformed my Vision Pro experience. It’s more than just an external drive; it’s a portable media server, a productivity hub, and a travel essential â€“ all in one sleek package.
